reviews.review: Sayın Valve hileleri oyundan tamamen kaldırabilse ve TR ye de bir server açıp ping değerlerimizin 50-60 tan 10-20ye düşmesini sağlasa muhtemelen vazgeçilmez oyunum olur.

Overall CSGO is a competetive shooter where you need high skill to achieve something and which is not broken when it comes to balance. The biggest problem is the amount of cheaters there are right now, especially in matchmaking (Aka ranked playmode). Still this game is pretty nice and i enjoy playing it.

Coming back from playing Rainbow six siege I can honestly say that the updated menus are not enough to keep me interested in this once wonderful shooter. However I do recommend that if you want to start in the FPS scene and don't know where to begin then this is it. Especially the "arms race" game mode introduces you to the various different types of guns (and their mechanics) in one single game.
